channel.title: Installation on Kubeconform - Fast Kubernetes manifests validation!
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Kubeconform - Fast Kubernetes manifests validation!

item.title: Installation
item.description: Linux Download the latest release from our release page. For example, for Linux on x86_64 architecture: curl -L https://github.com/redacid/kubeconform/releases/latest/download/kubeconform-linux-amd64.tar.gz | tar xvzf - && \ sudo mv kubeconform /usr/local/bin/ macOs Kubeconform is available to install using Homebrew: $ brew install kubeconform Windows Download the latest release from our release page.
